event.text: Through a gap in the trees, you spy the smouldering embers of a dying fire. Upon closer inspection, it appears to be enclosed by an abandoned campsite. Dark, unidentifiable mounds appear littered nearby.

outcome.text: After meandering through the treeline, an eerie silence falls as you reach the campsite. You move like a shadow from tent to tent, watching and listening for any signs of danger. Before you know it, you're away and back on to the road, having returned with rations and coin.
After passing through the treeline, an eerie silence falls as you reach the campsite. You search from tent to tent, yet find nothing of use. The place has already been picked clean.

After navigating through the treeline, an eerie silence falls as you reach the campsite. While nearing one of the tents, a mottled hand bursts out from the ground underfoot, raking at your leg. Groans and shifting earth can suddnely be heard all around. Quickly, you flee from the campsite, tripping over another grasping hand on your way out.
Turning away from the embers, you decide to stay on the path leading home.

When trying to turn your vision away from the embers, it appears that you cannot. Transfixed, you find yourself moving through the trees towards the now blazing bonfire, alluring azure beckoning you closer. Unable to resist, you step into unworldly flame. Your will instantly snaps back into your possession as intense searing pain wracks your body. The fire immediately extinguishes, abandoning you in pain and darkness.
